post.body: I prefer to help others grow their followers list in hopes they will encourage their followers to add me too (seems to do OK).
silly or not... that is the way it is... unless someone has some influence... all we can do is live by twitterville's rules
evidently twitter uses the 2000 limit 2 control spammers. Can wait for more followers. List building better than most social sites
hello to you as well! Like your web site. Let me know when I may help you. If I'm not following you after I reach 2000, remind me?
check out my web articles & ask your followers 2 add me if you believe they should. My clients are developers & associates.
I'm in the same situation... how about some shared shout-outs??? FOLLOWERS ADD @RealEstateZebra & @typeamom 2 YOUR LISTS. now me2?
appreciate your honesty... and I agree... but there are those who believe the light burns instead of illuminates their eternal souls.
maybe this will get you in the Christmas Spirit: http://twitpic.com/63jp - tie a ribbon around it & share it with everyone you wish!!
Christmas shopping was easy this year! Giving GREEN... the universal gift of $$$. Makes everyone on my list happy! Giving :>)
thank you! I was happily surprised! How have you been? I appreciate you keeping in touch... are you ready for Christmas yet?
is ranked 5,371 on Twitterholic.com, and 1 in Mobile, Alabama, USA! http://twitterholic.com/gfb3/
Thank You for adding me to your "following" list! Let me know when I may help you!

@J_T_Ray @stoppedclocks @BrentDPayne Thank You for adding me to your "following" list! Let me know when I may help you!
appreciate the Christmas well wishes! Hope your Christmas is better than you expect at http://yotamak.blogs.com/davidkamatoy/
